onHostDestroy().Description: Client triggered once the host(fragment) has been destroyed.

onHostStop().Description: Client triggered once the host(fragment) has stopped.

onHostStart().Description: Client triggered once the host(fragment) has started.

onHostPause().Description: Client triggered once the host(fragment) has paused.

onHostResume().Description: Client triggered once the host(fragment) has resumed.

ClassDesc: Callbacks triggered by the host(e.g. fragment) hosting the video controls/surface.
